title.narrative: Fight against torture in Tajikistan and support for the victim of torture and their families

description.narrative: Human rights situation in Tajikistan is very bad. The project has been developed in a response to the perceived need among civil society in Tajikistan to continue reinforce and step up coordinated efforts to fight torture and impunity in Tajikistan through monitoring and promoting of the realization of international and national human rights in the country as well as supporting the victims of torture and the members of their families. A core element of the project will be independent civil society monitorin g of the implementation of Tajikistan's international and national human rights obligations. Particular attention will be given to monitoring and evaluating progress of on the implementation of recommendations of international human rights bodies such as U N Human Rights Council in the framework of the Universal Periodic Review (UPR) UN Human Rights Treaty bodies and UN special procedures as well as national action plans adopted to give effect to recommendations of international bodies. Monitoring will also include case work with victims and potential victims of violations of fundamental rights the principle of nondiscrimination and the ban on torture and ill-treatment will have three components: trial monitoring legal assistance in court and assistance with the preparation of individual complaints to UN human rights bodies.In Tajikistan the court practice of paying compensation to torture of victims practically does not exist. This means that in practice without help of the Coalition Torture victims have no c hance whatsoever to obtain even small compensation. The objectives of the project are to promote state accountability in the sphere of human rights and secondly accurately determining the extent of the use of torture in Tajikistan.Project is submitted by t he Public Foundation Notabene on behalf of the Civil Society Coalition against Torture in Tajikistan that engages with EU OSCE and UN representations and foreign governments present in Tajikistan. Project is supported by the European Delegation in Tajikist an.
